content:
Homebrew Website Club comes to London! 
		 

		 
		 For the first time in a long long while London Homebrew Website Club is happening! 

 Tantek was in town so luckily made it by. Along with him we had Tom Morris and Barry Frost attending. 

 We've been discussing a range of topics/technologies for our websites including events publication, linking up various features via Bridgy, photo tagging/syndicating and live displaying what music you're listening to. 

 We're planning to make this a monthly to begin with so if you're in London next month and have a website feature to work on, show or even just to offer or get some help â€“ come along! 

 Next event 

  July Homebrew Website Club, London 
  27th July 2016, 18:00 to 19:30 at ProvenDough (Covent Garden)  110 St Martin's Lane, Covent Garden, London, WC2N 4BA, England  Show location on map (external link)51.5101498, -0.1271938 
   Get together, do and discuss all things IndieWeb-related:   Visit the indiewebcamp.com event page to show you're attending.
